<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flurrying](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1867)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a melee weapon with the  monk  trait

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you make a [Flurry of Blows](/Actions.aspx?ID=9) using the etched weapon and your first Strike reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points, you can make your second Strike with an echo of the weapon, increasing the reach to 30 feet.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The weapon casts a [_spiritual weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=306) spell. The ghostly weapon looks like the etched weapon. Use your normal attack bonus and damage for the weapon instead of the damage listed in the spell, but use your Wisdom modifier instead of Strength when determining damage. You can choose to make a Flurry of Blows instead of a Strike when the _spiritual weapon_ attacks; this still counts as your [flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73) for the turn. You can Sustain this activation in the same manner as the spell.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Flurrying
